Package games.stendhal.common.parser

Class SimilarExprMatcher

java.lang.Object
games.stendhal.common.parser.ExpressionMatcher
games.stendhal.common.parser.SimilarExprMatcher
public class SimilarExprMatcher extends ExpressionMatcher
SimilarExprMatcher creates an ExpressionMatcher with similarity matching.
Author:
Martin Fuchs
